Class Display

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, CommandListener, jam.plot.Displayer, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.util.Observer, java.io.Serializable
public class Display
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements jam.plot.Displayer, CommandListener, java.util.Observer

This class is a display routine for plots. It is implemented by Display.

Since:
JDK1.1
Version:
0.5 April 98
Author:
Ken Swartz
See Also:
Graphics, Serialized Form
